body.name: 2nd Generation Wireless Retro Game Stick, Retro Video Game Console, 9 emulators, (64G), with Over 13000 Built-in Electronic Games, 4K HDMI Output, Dual 2.4G Wireless Control Plug and Play Retro Game
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 3 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 33 mins
features: 【4K Gaming experience】 perfect to meet your high resolution and game configuration needs.Support 4K HD HDMI output, 1080P HD picture quality, equipped with extended HDMI cable, suitable for different monitors, can be connected to TV/computer/TV set-top box /PC,Please make sure your screen has an HDMI input port so that the console can connect to your TV/TV set-top box.

【2 Wireless Controllers】The 2.4GHz wireless controller supports 2 players, and the 2.4GHz wireless game controller is equipped with a retro video game console and 9 emulators, which can achieve wireless connection between the game controller and the joystick.

【Built-in 13000+ Vintage Video Games】No need to download and install on your own. No need for the internet. Simply connect to the TV and play over 20000 classic games. The wireless classic TV game console system is equipped with over 13000 rich games and 9 pre installed emulators, as well as a 64GB TF card. Let you play games every day, bring your memories back to the fun of childhood, and enjoy family entertainment time.

[Easy to Operate] -- Just connect the retro game stick to the power supply, then plug it into the TV, change the TV signal source to the HD channel. Proceed as follows: 1. Connect the HD output of the TV. 2. Insert the built-in TF game card. 3. Use the charging adapter to connect to the TV. 4. The game stick will automatically turn on when the charging adapter is being connected to TV. NOTE: 2 wireless controllers are needed to install 4xAAA batteries which are not included in package.

【Fantasic Gift to Kids/Adults】The nostalgia stick game console not only brings fun playtime to children, but also awakens fond childhood memories of post-80s and post-90s adults, while releasing the stress of their lives. Perfect for kids or adults of all ages as a birthday/christmas/ thanksgiving/ halloween/gift - let them build happy childhood memories.
body.description: Classic Gaming Reimagined：Step into the world of timeless gaming nostalgia with our exceptional Wireless Retro Game Stick! This video retro game console is a true gem for any gaming enthusiast, offering a thrilling array of features. With 9 emulators built-in, you'll have access to a staggering collection of over 20,000 classic games, guaranteeing endless hours of fun and exploration.Unlock Gaming's Golden Era:Equipped with a spacious (64GB) storage capacity, you'll never run out of space for your favorite games. The 4K HDMI output delivers an immersive and crisp gaming experience, breathing new life into your beloved classics. Plus, the included dual 2.4G wireless controllers ensure that you can enjoy multiplayer gaming with ease, whether you're competing or cooperating with friends and family.Unleash Nostalgia:What sets our retro game console apart is its user-friendly "plug and play" design. No need for complicated setup processes; simply plug it in, and you're ready to embark on a gaming adventure. The compact and sleek design makes it a seamless addition to any entertainment setup, and its portability means you can relive the golden age of gaming wherever you choose.Timeless Gaming Nostalgia: Rediscover the thrill of gaming with our Wireless Retro Game Stick. It's not just a console; it's a time machine that transports you back to the arcade glory days. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or introducing a new generation to the classics, this console is your gateway to countless hours of joy. Elevate your gaming experience, unleash your inner competitor, and create lasting memories with this all-in-one retro game console. Welcome to the ultimate gaming paradise!

reviews.reviewText: The games seem to be pretty good but one of my controllers toggle broke after playing one game. I reached out to the seller and he immediately sent out another game with controllers. He made the customer (me and my kid) happy! If you enjoy nostalgic games this is the one to get. Good games and great customer care. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy instructions to set up and play. The navigation was tricky at first to get back to the original screen after selecting the game but after a while, I was able to go back to the original screen with no problems. All the games that I have tried worked well. I’m surprised at some of the Capcom fighting games play very well with no lag. It’s kind of crazy to think that with the older councils they were struggling so hard to put arcade games over without enough RAM or graphics being removed is so many games to play in to name on here. Just know that if you played video games since the late 70’s , up to the end of the 2010. The game is more likely to be there, and it plays almost arcade part. I not only recommend this, but I will be purchasing several more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works really well!
reviews.reviewText: I have spent a lot of time trying out this 2nd generation game stick and I gotta say - really like it. It doesn’t seem like much out of the box, just a small stick and two wireless controllers, but it turns out that is all you need to play a ton of fun games. You simply plug the stick into a tv or monitor via HDMI cable and then plug the other end into an outlet. The two controllers need 2 AAA batteries each, and then there is a switch on the underside of each controller to turn it on. The controllers are PlayStation 2 style, and a little on the cheap side, but they do work well for playing all these games. I didn’t have any trouble with them, but I do wonder how long they will last. They can be replaced with other wireless controllers, but you do need the controller that has a wireless USB plug. As far as the games go, this system comes with emulators for the Famicon, gameboy, MAME, PlayStation, snes, genesis, and Atari. Everything seems to play very well except for the PlayStation emulator. This one runs games very slowly and it is actually quite hilarious to hear the voices in the games playing deep and slow. I’m not sure why the PlayStation was included because the games are basically unplayable. Everything else seems to run very well, the only real real glitch I see is the often the title screen music for games does not play. There are thousands of games loaded into this stick and a vast majority of them play just fine. My only complaint is that the navigator is a bit cumbersome to use. You have to scroll forever sometimes to get to the game you want to play. Since all the titles are alphabetized, it can take a long time to scroll to the game if it is in the middle of the pack. There is also multiple copies of many games that are for different languages and regions. This adds to the scrolling, and hopefully I can figure out the correct way to remove unwanted titles. On a positive note, when you download a game and then quit out, it takes you back to the screen you last left on, which is very nice. Overall, I am very impressed with how much fun I am having with this system. There is a great selection of nes, snes, and genesis games to keep you busy forever. I love the portability of this game stick and the wireless controllers really add to the replay value. If you are looking for a nice portable device to play emulated games, I would recommend this one.
